posts.message: If you are looking at this (which I guess you are), the install of FluxBB appears to have worked! Now log in and head over to the administration control panel to configure your forum.
Great — looks like everything installed successfully! I’ll log in now and head to the admin control panel to finish setting up the forum. Thanks!
Looks like the install worked, but I don’t seem to have access to the administration control panel. Could you check if my account has admin permissions or let me know how to access it?
